website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight vacuum that can tackle just about any cleaning job you need it to without losing suction.
pros: Doubles as a handheld vacuum for floor-to-ceiling cleaning
cons: This vacuum may not work well on thick carpeting or rugs

customer_reviews.title: Great Product BUT Pay Attention to Description Details
customer_reviews.text: It's super light and I use it on my carport & hard surfaces. HOWEVER, buyer please read product description in full. The title states "true pet" so I was expecting the mini motorized brush and it doesn't come with that attachment. But if you read the entire description then you will see that it doesn't. Lesson learned for me. ALSO, it didn't come with filters. I almost damaged mine. Had to buy filters separately. After those add-ons, I pretty much paid for a new vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Tvbw

customer_reviews.title: Take care if you are aged.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all on vacuuming ability. At 90 years old, I thought under 8 pounds would be fine but finding it tiring in arms. My fault, I want superb vacuuming in a 4 pound machine. No such thing, either one or the other. This is not a machine I will happily pull out more than once a week. No pets, tiny 1 bedroom apartment. Should be sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Waterman

customer_reviews.title: which means a good portion of the attachments that are supposed to come ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy. Does not come with the right attachments of the Shark Rocket. It comes with only a few new generic attachments, which means a good portion of the attachments that are supposed to come with the vacuum are missing including the small power brush, the hardwood floor attachment, hose etc. Do yourself a big favor and buy a new one or even a damaged box one. But stay miles away from this. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and maneuverable. I live in a fully carpeted apartment and this vacuum does it's job without issue. I also have a cat and the felt brush attachment is good for cleaning hair off the couch. Small enough to store in a closet without taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Lukess08

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on a refurb
customer_reviews.text: Photos are deceiving. Does not come with pet attachment OR FILTER!?!? REALLY? Not that impressed with the suction. Maybe this is just a bad refurb. Swept up more than my battery operated one. Looked like crap out of the box. All scratched and dented like someone threw it down the stairs. Buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: KAAcosta

customer_reviews.title: Great little guy
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is amazing. It picks up dust like a magnet. I thought that our regular vacuum was doing a good job but this vacuum is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Light, strong, easy to use vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these last year for myself and love it! I purchased this one for my stepdaughter who has health issues that make it hard for her to push her heavy vacuum around to clean. This light machine works much better for her, and we both love the swivel head that seems to anticipate just where you want it to go! The suction is strong and picks up pet hair and dirt very well. I am thinking about ordering another for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Genius
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is genius. Extremely well thought out and intuitive. It picks up things on the first run through that other vacuums weren't able to get after multiple cleanings and it's extremely lightweight and versatile. We have an 18 mos old, long hair, orange tabby cat and when all else failed this vacuum came to the rescue. We're not swimming in hair anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: great condition (none of the issues that others flagged in ...
customer_reviews.text: as advertised, all accessories as promised, great condition (none of the issues that others flagged in their reviews)...This is my second Shark Rocket (refurbished), one for the house and the other for a remote cabin. Both in great condition
customer_reviews.author: darrell j murray

customer_reviews.title: perfect light vacuum for smaller jobs
customer_reviews.text: perfect light vacuum for smaller jobs .I have another model of Shark,but I wanted a lighter one due to a bad shoulder and neck ,for in between vacuum jobs,for the dog hair etc.I love it so much I use it all the time now.The only bad thing is that the dirt cup is pretty small,so I have to empty it a lot more than my bigger Shark vacuum. I would highly recommend this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: kats

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Suction
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Shark refurbished vacuum I’ve bought for myself and I’ve bought 4 for family members. This vacuum works exceptionally well and it came in excellent condition along with all the attachments - you’d never know it was refurbished. All the others I bought for family members came in perfect condition, too. It’s lightweight, fits under most all furniture and picks up everything!
customer_reviews.author: CzechNovots

customer_reviews.title: Great refurbished product!
customer_reviews.text: Product came VERY quickly. It was in good condition and seems like it came with more accessories than our original new one we bought this one to replace it with. Works well. Very happy with this refurbished product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to please and I realize it!
customer_reviews.text: Kids and dogs keep our home pretty messy which is difficult for people that like clean and fresh everything. This got stubborn Black dog hair off our white sectional with ease. NOTHING has been able to do this... trust me I’ve tried it everything and the only thing that has work is a straight razor. This has saved my couch and my rugs look beautiful. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I am not impressed with this vacuum. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed with this vacuum. I have all would and tile floors so it doesn't do well on them. And the extensions are cheap and their isn't an arm to use for underneath bed and furniture. Plus the vacuum wont go underneath beds because of main part of the vacuum is to large. I wont purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: kelli mcentee

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is amazing! I have two cats with floating fur
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing! I have two cats with floating fur, and my partner is allergic to cats. This gets so much dirt and fur off the floor that I don't have to get rid of any of them! My one complaint is the size of the debris collector. It's a bit small, but I can deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: redheaddebate

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for an apartment
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for an apartment, stores great, works great, handles any mess I throw at it. Only downside is the storage of the additional pieces, where am i supposed to place these?
customer_reviews.author: alex zwick

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. The light on the hand held and the vacuum itself is amazing. I never thought that having a light would make a huge difference. It has strong power to be such a small and light vacuum. I like the attachments it came with as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aleigha

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I was surprised and impressed on how well this cleans. We used this on a rug that was previously vacuumed with our old vacuum found a lot of dirt in the waste bin. One thing that has to be done is install the included hook so we can hang up the vacuum. The unit won't stand on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Martin

customer_reviews.title: Hose of powerhead splits open and theres no replacement option
customer_reviews.text: I thought the hose on the powerhead splitting the first time i bought this product was an anomaly. I bought it again because i liked its usability so much. But the hosehead split on me again! After not even a year...customer service said the powerhead isnt covered under warranty and a new one is $100.00. Half the price of the entire unit?? What a scam. Im so disappointed in this product and policy that doesnt cover what ive read online to be the most common breaking part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic machine
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my eighties and have purchased quite a few vacuum cleaners in my life but I have never been happier than I am with the Shark. It is a superb machine, with amazing suction. I vacuumed my carpets, with my old machine, a couple of days before I got the Shark, did it again when I received it and couldn't believe the amount of stuff it picked up. Its light, easy to set up and use, buy one, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because it doesn't stand up. You have to lean it against something or it falls. I find this annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Alper

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware.While I was very pleased with the function of the vacuum, mine died in less than one year, past the 6 month warranty period. I have family who bought theirs new, are older, and have had no problems. I would not go with a refurbished unit again
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum for pets ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never loved a vacuum so much!! I have a German Shepherd and this thing is awesome for dog hair! If you're looking for a great pet hair vacuum, look no further!! I used to clean houses so, I knew I wanted a Shark, did a little research....so glad I picked this one! Super lightweight, great maneuverability!! If I could give 10 stars, I would!
customer_reviews.author: Maria -Michigan Girl

customer_reviews.title: amazing vacuum
customer_reviews.text: absolutely LOVE this vacuum! absolutely no problems with it. works awesome! great suction and light weight. has a light so you can see the small stuff on the floor (especially hard wood). comes with an array of attachments which i use for the inside of my car. the handled part of the vacuum also has a light on it, so that is perfect when using in the car. came with all filters and pieces. great price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for long haired dogs
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of this the we had for years and it finally kicked the van. So we bought this, I really love the lights on it. Works great amazing if you have dogs with long hair.
customer_reviews.author: The Smith Family

customer_reviews.title: It comes with instructions ❤❤
customer_reviews.text: I love ALL of the attachments on this thing!! I vacuumed my living room and kitchen... I can't wait to vacuum the rest of the house!! My friend used this vacuum and she is a housekeeper.. I worked for her and I hated this vacuum .. but then I noticed what it did. Yes you have to pay attention to the filter... dust it out or wash it by hand. Either one seems to do the trick. I love this vacuum and will continue to buy it even after 4 kids, 2 dogs , 1 hamster, 2 parakeets, and 1 Guinea pig.. 😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the vacuum but top heavy and won't stand up
customer_reviews.author: nancie

customer_reviews.title: This product is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be returning this item, it’s terrible has no suction power. Won’t even suck up a small piece of paper. Nice looking unit, clean and looks new but won’t suck up anything. Not recommended unless you just want to look at it.
customer_reviews.author: neal d neese

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Vaccum performed okay. Really cumbersome and I wish that it would stand up on its own. Would not suggest this to anyone. Update. This vacuum is horrible. Who in their right mind would make a vacuum that doesn't stand up on its own. Designers must have never vacuumed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have loved my previous Sharks but this is by far my favorite. I can vacuum under the bird cage and under the couch! Great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: A. Geesaman

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum is no good.
customer_reviews.text: It says its great for pets but it doesnt even suck hard enough to pick up cat hair. It says it leaves clean streaks in your carpet also not true. Extremely disappointed in the product. Not worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: I clean houses for a living and I love love love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I clean houses for a living and I love love love this vacuum. It is light, durable and easy to keep clean and functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Lindi

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value, functionality
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to use. Does a great job on carpets, area rugs and floors. Doesn't take up a lot of space. Bagless; replacement filters easy to get. Would definitely recommend and will undoubtedly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Britt

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome be sure to clean the filter every third use or white dust will come out and you can’t see it
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Smelt like it was going to catch on fire!
customer_reviews.text: When I was unboxing it I just have bad vibes. It was dirty and I was just trying to get past it like it’s not that bad well then I couldn’t get the bottom vacuum piece to stay on. Then I started to vacuum and it smelt like it was going to catch on fire! So I immediately shut off and unplugged it! It also didn’t come with ABSOLUTELY ANY ATTACHMENTS! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Henkels

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cleaning at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived looking like a brand new machine. Works perfectly and does a fantastic job--so much better than my previous vacuum. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S Y LEE

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I've had it a week, but definitely more suction than the cordless model I had! We only use it on hardwood and it's been impossible to find a way to thoroughly clean our floors. This vacuum definitely does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Fahren Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: No problem with refurbished. Can see a little prior use on it, but can't beat the price. Arrived as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks! Literally everything off the ground
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sucks! Literally everything off the ground. It is amazing. I love it. Came with everything it said and looks great for a refurbishment.
customer_reviews.author: Erics9971

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Careful with the high speed , she takes off ! Our original shark finally gave out . Happy we found this great deal and it works better than our old one .
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is maneuverable enough to get under the bed and the suction is very strong. It is light weight and easy to clean the dust canister.
customer_reviews.author: J. GODFREY

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing! The first time I used it I picked up so much stuff it was like I had never vacuumed my house! It’s not lightweight and storage is a little awkward bc all the weight is at the top, but totally worth those little faults.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Young

customer_reviews.title: One of the best !!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases of the last year. I spent a lot of time reading reviews to choose the right vacuum cleaner and made a good choice. It works very well, it can be easily cleaned and it has a light weight what is essential for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best vacuum I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I have owned. Lightweight and effective. Cord is long. I wish it was cordless but that always comes with its own issues so I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Garonzik

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my cleaning business
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is amazing I love it moves under furniture great suction is great all around this vacuum is worth every dollar spent will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Rodney & Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not properly refurbished!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. Received this vacuum and the dust dispenser does not even stay shut!! It works fine, but the dust dumped back out on carpet twice before I realized the ridiculous flaw!! Does not snap shut, no latch, nothing!, Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: MSmith

customer_reviews.title: ... works very well on my wood floor not so good on carpet needs to be raise up otherwise works ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this about a month and it works very well on my wood floor not so good on carpet needs to be raise up otherwise works very well love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: It was like new imaculant work s beautifully especially with pet hair. Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.author: kristine barnes

customer_reviews.title: This is a very powerful vacuum. It picked up ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful vacuum. It picked up a disturbing amount of dirt the first time I used it from what I thought was clean carpet. I had to empty the dust bin 3 times. It can lose suction if too much stuff gets stuck to the interior filter, but thats just because it was pulling up so much junk.
customer_reviews.author: Harbor Seal

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, but brush dosent spin string
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum, but brush dosent spin string, it's definitely defective, that's what I get for getting the refurbished one.. Need to get a new one
customer_reviews.author: Dan Silver

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It arrived today and I love it. It took under 10 minutes to vacuum 4 rooms. It’s self-propelled and the suction is outstanding. It was easy to assemble and allows me to vacuum under furniture without moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Veri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it works great on hardwood floors. Just what i wanted..
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: The light weight of it
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight of it . But it doesn't have a big enough dirt holder . To small. Had to empty it after I vacuumed one room
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cook

customer_reviews.title: It is light
customer_reviews.text: It is very light ,and the dust holder easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: uriel lozano

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really couldn't be happier. Light, maneuverable, powerful, easy to use and empty.
customer_reviews.author: John Guarascio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Performance
customer_reviews.text: For me, best yet vacuum. The performance definitely makes up for any less appealing features.
customer_reviews.author: GiddyGoats-N-FlyingMonkeys

customer_reviews.title: Good Vaccum
customer_reviews.text: Light, durable and picks up glitter ... In my book that makes it a pretty good vaccum.
customer_reviews.author: BizzellPalmer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I really like using this on my furniture. It does an excellent job getting the dog hair!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey I. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum . It is so lightweight and versatile and easy to store . It’s the only vacuum I have ever liked !
customer_reviews.author: Alana Davis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good I like it very much and a outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a shark vac for many years. I love them. I ordered this one for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It was great a already had one and that’s why I brought another
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Clavette

customer_reviews.title: ... what I wanted lite weight and does a very good job on my hard wood floors
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is just what I wanted lite weight and does a very good job on my hard wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: windjammer

customer_reviews.title: This actually delivers what it promises.
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight and gets under furniture and stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best vacuum I've owned in 35 years (ever since the day I moved out of mom & dad's). And I've owned many many vacuums since.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Stone

customer_reviews.title: It’s noy good
customer_reviews.text: It really not good I wish I didn’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: Alma Cecunjanin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. Light enough to pick up with one hand. Great power and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: See the dirt gone.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to vacuum under furniture. The lights help guide areas that were missed with traditional vacuums. Suction is comparable to my Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine that works well. Really picks up hidden dirt. 1 flaw is it is hard to store anywhere because it is very very top heavy. My wife is scared if is going to fall and break if stored somewhere and falls!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Best! Bestest!!
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I have ever had. Wonderful on hardwood floors. Amazing how much it picks up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consumer
customer_reviews.text: It meet my expectations. The suction could be a little more stronger. But for the price it did good. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great hands down. I highly recommend buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Martin

customer_reviews.title: It was not complete, as the vacuum did not ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not complete, as the vacuum did not come with the motorized pet attachment as it does with the new version. I bought it because it was an open and returned/repaired item; however, I would have just purchased the new one if had known what I was getting was different than what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Since it was refurbished in guessing. It did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Since it was refurbished in guessing. It did not pick up anything and wasn't completely light weight at all. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these vacuums and will never buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Shark vacuum. I LOVE these vacuums and will never buy anything else. Their customer service is also OUTSTANDING!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Product was used one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item thinking this is refurbished but when I opened the box it was used one and so many scratches on it. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Mourya

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed about no pet head
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and works great. I didn't give it five stars because it advertised it with the actuall motorized pet head ( which was why I purchased it) but it didn't come with it. So beware when you buy this for the motorized pet head. You won't get one.
customer_reviews.author: Country girl

customer_reviews.title: No hook to hang unit otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: over all its great but for some reason it didn't come with the mount to hang it on the wall and I'm pretty sure that would be standard otherwise it was for some reason they told me it was going to be delayed shipping but it was fast the hook to hang bothers me given it doesn't stand well on its own
customer_reviews.author: houseoftori

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, very functional for different needs.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dyson that I was not altogether impressed with, so when I wanted another vacuum, I choose to go with this Shark. It is absolutely perfect for my needs. I wanted to be able to carry it easily up and down the stairs, and to vacuum the stairs quickly. It is light and easy to handle and very intuitive as to the different functions. It has a different speed for bare floor and carpet, which is great for me too. I love the size and it is very powerful. It is exactly what I wanted and I'm very pleased to far.
customer_reviews.author: Marshak

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum. I have a rechargeable Dyson that I love, except the battery runs down before I am finished using it. The new rechargeable Dysons hold their charge longer but are just too expensive. So I bought this. Some of my friends have this vacuum and love it. It is heavier than my Dyson and doesn't get under things and around corners like my Dyson (because the head is larger). But it does a great job of cleaning! And that's what I'm after, at a reasonable price. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - especially on hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: We have hardwoods in our home and recently got a german shepherd. Although she stays outside most of the time, she still sleeps inside. I had NO idea how much fur she could shed. This vacuum is so easy and convenient to use. Whenever I see a few furballs, I attack the entire floor just to make sure I have missed any. My only disappointment was that it did not come with something to hang it. I understand it is available for purchase so I will be getting that very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Maggi F

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum kicks ass. Really, it's so powerful it pulls itself. Great maneuverability. My only complaint is that the brush get clogged with hair way too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, but it loses a star because of the weight at the top. That weight makes it a bit more difficult to use for a disabled person, but still doable with breaks. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Patti Clatterbuck

customer_reviews.title: Not for carpeted houses, but great otherwise
customer_reviews.text: This has a small canister and a small head. If you have wall to wall carpet, forget it. We have wood floors with some rugs, and I mostly wanted the detachable head to give me a wand to suck up like spiderwebs and spiders etc. This is PERFECT for that. You can have a long wand, a short wand, brush, it's very flexible. Note this is CORDED-I wish it were cordless, but NONE of those have great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: eric_the_redder

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Almost let this slide by as I was too disappointed the first time. It BARELY works!!! Hardwood floors, little runners and we're talking about a camper here people!!! Save your money and look elsewhere. I cannot believe what they get away with charging for this trash.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K.

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks big time.
customer_reviews.text: This thing really sucks! It sounds like a jet plane taking off but nothing avoids the suction. Having the motor in the handle makes the vac versatile but kind of awkward to get used to the weight.. Cleaning up any type of floor is a breeze even in the dark with the bright LED light that focuses on the job at hand. My daughter wanted to steel it when she tried it out.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great sweeper buy only new
customer_reviews.text: I got this vaccum from the warehouse and it works well. I had to clean every part of it. The canister was totally full of dirt and the filter was dirty. I threw it away. The sweeper head had to have thread cut out of it. I would have sent it back but it is a hour drive to the nearest drop off. Wont buy anything from amazon warehouse again.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum ever!! I have a friend who owns her own cleaning business and she uses these vacuums. They are light weight and easily come apart to use as a handheld!
customer_reviews.author: TRACY BECKNELL

customer_reviews.title: SHARK you really need to do better for what you are charging for these they need ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a referb and it does not work well at all. SHARK you really need to do better for what you are charging for these they need to be put together better and work like you advertise them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Super and small vacuum. Works really good. Vacuumed with our Oreck and then used the Shark over the same area. The Shark pocked up additional material. Vaccumed the couch and pulled a lot of crud out of the fabric and stuffing.. would highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rider10

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum ever! I got a refurbished one on Amazon, works great, they sent me the pet one. It's so light, I love the light on it, I didn't see the purpose of it until I used it, it shows me all the dog hair I'm missing. I have a huge heavy pet hoover vacuum, the funnel thing in is the middle of cannister that you empty, so. Actually this little thing fits almost as much as the huge vacuum, it's amazing. Also, the attachment worked better then anything I've ever tried on getting dog hair - huge heavy shedding German Shepard hair off the Mico suade couch.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum. It easily moves from hardwood to carpet. I haven't used the handheld so I can't comment. It assembles easily. The dustcup does need to be dumped fairly often but I wouldn't want a larger capacity because it would make the vacuum too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: BeagleMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall vacuum minus the standing abilities
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum. Great suction. Lightweight and very maneuverable. Easy to clean out. Biggest con is that it can't stand up on it's own. Needs to lean against something or be hung up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Bad ass
customer_reviews.text: You want a vacuum that works. Pick up one of these bad boys. I have two different Dyson's and they pull dirt out of my carpet. But I used this after I used my Dyson and I was amazed at how much dirt was in the carpet left by my Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this Shark Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Shark Rocket. We have one for upstairs and now one for downstairs. We are soooo happy with this particular vacuum it is amazing and we love how the parts are interchangeable so quickly without all the fuss. It is lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Has very good suction
customer_reviews.text: We use it to clean glitter and Christmas debris. It is great but if you tip it it Spills out the bottom. Other than that we love it! We would definitely Buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Buy new
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces and the suction was not good. Returning and buying new version thats only $30 more and actually comes with the pet hair remover accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny five

customer_reviews.title: Works great. And it is fairly light and swivels
customer_reviews.text: Works great. And it is fairly light and swivels. I would be happier, if it stood on its own--I have to lean it against a wall or let it fall to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lovitz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pet Hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this vacuum! Our dog is an Aussie/Golden Retriever mix and dog hair is a huge issue in our house. This vacuum is a lifesaver. It is lightweight, easy to use and empty, and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Kay L.

customer_reviews.title: by far the best most powerful vacuum I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: by far the best most powerful vacuum I've ever owned. It cleans everything and I think it's of solid quality construction. Very happy with the purchase. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

product_meta.title: Shark Rocket DeluxePro Ultra-Light Upright Corded Stick Vacuum, Bordeaux (Renewed)
product_meta.description: The Shark Rocket True Pet Ultra-Light Vacuum lives up to every bit of its name and every inch of its cleaning path. If you’re tired of emptying out and replacing filthy vacuum bags and sick of pushing around a vacuum which feels like a lawnmower, then this upright stick vacuum is for you. /nThe first neat feature boasts its very name. This lightweight vacuum’s multi-surface cleaning ability tackles both hard floors and deep-cleans carpets. /nOnce you’re finished with the floors, move on to the ceilings, blinds, and furniture with this powered upright vacuum. One of the perks include this lightweight vac’s ability to convert into a handheld model which you can use with its attachments including the nozzle and extension wand. Got hard-to-reach places? This vacuum has the tools to help so you don’t have to dread cleaning around couches, under desks, or dusting the curtains. /nOnce you’ve finished literally re-defining the phrase “cleaning from top-to-bottom,” you’ll appreciate this lightweight design, which allows you to transport and store this bagless upright vac. /nIf you’ve got pets, you’ve got a mess. Just because you love your animals doesn’t mean you love their dander, allergens, and other messes they leave behind. Instead of your pets leaving you stranded behind a mess and a heavy vacuum, enjoy running this slim stick vacuum across your floor, leaving clean-streaks behind. /nCleaning up messes doesn’t have to be boring, bulky, or awkward. Instead, let the Shark Rocket Upright Vacuum do the work for you because you work hard enough.
feature_bullets: All the power and strength of an upright vacuum with none of the weight
Multi-surface cleaning lets you clean your house from top to bottom;LED lights to brighten up corners and under furniture
2 times the dust cup capacity as the original Rocket vacuum
At under 10 lbs., it easily converts into a hand vacuum for versatile floor-to-ceiling cleaning
Equipped with Advanced Swivel Steering, LED headlights to reveal debris, and has an XL-capacity dust cup

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars267 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
